text: Deai tangada i digau ala ne dubu i Judah dela ne hana e halahala dono gowaa e noho i Egypt ga mouli laa ai. Deai tangada i digaula bolo ia gaa hana gi muli gi Judah, gi di gowaa e hiihai e mouli ia ai. Deai tangada e hana gi Judah ai, aalaa hua go digau hogoohi ala ne llele gi daha mo Egypt.”
